title: How to estimate calories burned from arbitrary limb movement (Newtonian mechanics, forces, energy, work, biology, physics) - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll give an answer from the bicycle world: There are now good instruments to measure the power output of a rider, therefore the mechanical energy he produces. His actual enetry output is roughly twice as much due to heat loss.I believe the same can be applied to weightlifting.
